attributes.action: reduce MP's holiday entitlement to a level in line with the rest of the public sector.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of Parliament currently get three weeks for Christmas and a massive three months during the summer. MP's are well paid and well looked after. It is time they were bought in line with the rest of the working population in this country.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
